players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night. He's a threat to us all."
Diana: " I think we should investigate Charlie to see if he's the mafioso."
You: "We should investigate Diana to see if she's the mafioso."
Bob: "I think Alice is mistaken. Charlie was the one I killed last night, so he can't be the mafioso now."
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Alice, Diana voted for Bob
